description: This file implements the main React component for a Tic Tac Toe game, including UI components like Square, Board, and the root App component managing game state, winner detection, and rendering. It defines theme styling, game logic, and user interactions.

methods.name: calculateWinner
methods.description: Utility function to determine the winner of the tic tac toe game based on current board state.

methods.name: Square
methods.description: Functional component representing a clickable cell in the game grid.

methods.name: Board
methods.description: Component rendering the 3x3 grid of Squares for the game.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Root component managing the game state, user interactions, and overall layout.
